definition: the Ferghana Valley in modern Uzbekistan
pinyin: Fei4 er3 gan4 na4 Pen2 di4

definition: tree trunk/main part of sth/to manage/to work/to do/capable/cadre/to kill (slang)/to fuck (vulgar)
to receive/to accept/to enjoy/to bring into/to pay (tax etc)/nano- (one billionth)/to reinforce sole of shoes or stockings by close sewing
basin/flower pot/unit of volume equal to 12 斗[dou3] and 8 升[sheng1], approx 128 liters/CL:個|个[ge4]
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
